pullRequest.title: create pprof_profile_dir before heap profiling
pullRequest.bodyText:
only add create dir code(vagetablechicken@18ee0eb#diff-2e6f5a32f0d05c704d7c66abf7e74ae3R246), contain too much clang-format diff
If config::heap_profile_dir is no use, I'd like to remove it in this pr.

  
    
      incubator-doris/be/src/service/backend_service.cpp
    
    
         Line 76
      in
      feef077
    
    
    
    

        
          
           HeapProfilerStart(config::heap_profile_dir.c_str());

nodes.bodyText:
better to use {} to enclose the operation
better to use FileUtils instead of boost
